And Snot-boy climbed up toward the moon.
Snot Boy saw that Cod was waiting.

column5: Because of this what white people say "eclipse of the moon" we say "Cod has bitten our moon" and "cod bites"

column5: Because of this the Nuuchahnulth call "eclipse of the moon" "the moon is bit"
They paddled way out to the Bering Sea
And then at the Bering Sea it became foggy.
They took that scooner back to Heshquiaht

column5: And one year later the Hesquiahts saw a boat arriving toward Hesquiaht.
It is good news, they all said.
And they all went to the beach waiting for the canoe.

column5: Snot boy wanted to marry a young woman called m̓aaqumsa, in the moon.

column5: That young woman is beautiful who Snot-boy wants to marry, he told Eagle.
I only want to see the young girl in the moon.

column5: It is because snail was not quick going there that he got bad eyesight.
